item.title: CVE-2023-4706|2023-11-08T21:59:24.521Z -- lenovo -- 1lenovo%20preload%20directory
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo preloaded devices deployed using Microsoft AutoPilot under a standard user account due to incorrect default privileges.
